Augment.Name: Shadow Caster - +3 Profane Concentration, +1 Profane Spell DCs
Augment.Description: +3 Profane bonus to Concentration +1 Profane bonus to Spell DCs

Augment.Name: Shadow Disciple - +3 Profane Concentration, +1 Profane tactics DCs
Augment.Description: +3 Profane bonus to Concentration +1 Profane bonus to tactics DCs

Augment.Name: Shadow Killer - +2d6 Profane Sneak Attack, +1 Profane Reflex save
Augment.Description: +2d6 Profane bonus to Sneak Attack +1 Profane bonus to Reflex saving throws

Augment.Name: Shadow Striker - +3% Profane bonus to Doublestrike, Melee Alacrity 15%, Ranged Alacrity 20%
Augment.Description: +3% Profane bonus to Doublestrike Melee Alacrity 15% Ranged Alacrity 20%

Augment.Name: Shadow Guardian - DR 30/Epic, DR 60/Epic while below 75% health
Augment.Description: DR 30/Epic DR 60/Epic while below 75% health

Effect.DisplayName: Shadow Guardian - DR 60/Epic while below 75% health

Augment.Name: Shadow Construct - Repair Amplification 10%
Augment.Description: Repair Amplification 10%

Augment.Name: Blinding Fear
Augment.Description: Blinding Fear: On Hit: Blinds and Shakens foe for 6 sec, 12 sec cool down.

Augment.Name: 1st Degree Burns
Augment.Description: 1st Degree Burns: On Hit: Applies a stack of Vulnerable (1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.) This effect may only occur on-hit once every two seconds. Also 5 to 30 Fire Damage.

Augment.Name: Touch of Flames
Augment.Description: Touch of Flames: On Hit: 10 to 60 Fire Damage.

Augment.Name: Touch of Shadows
Augment.Description: Touch of Shadows: On Hit: 8 to 48 Negative Energy Damage.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Potency
Augment.Description: Passive: +100 Equipment Bonus to all Spell Powers.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Combustion
Augment.Description: Passive: +150 Equipment Bonus to Fire Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Corrosion
Augment.Description: Passive: +150 Equipment Bonus to Acid Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Devotion
Augment.Description: Passive: +150 Equipment Bonus to Positive Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Glaciation
Augment.Description: Passive: +150 Equipment Bonus to Cold Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Impulse
Augment.Description: Passive: +150 Equipment Bonus to Impulse Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Magnetism
Augment.Description: Passive: +150 Equipment Bonus to Electric Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Nullification
Augment.Description: Passive: +150 Equipment Bonus to Negative/Poison Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Radiance
Augment.Description: Passive: +150 Equipment Bonus to Light Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Reconstruction
Augment.Description: Passive: +150 Equipment Bonus to Repair Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Resonance
Augment.Description: Passive: +150 Equipment Bonus to Sonic Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Dragon's Blessing
Augment.Description: Dragon's Blessing: On Friend-Targeted Spell Cast: 5% chance of AOE Healing Effect (~100HP) centered on target (AOE is size of Mass Cure spells).

Augment.Name: Dragon's Edge
Augment.Description: Dragon's Edge: Passive: Armor-Piercing 35%. On Crit: 33 to 105 Bleeding Damage.

Augment.Name: 2nd Degree Burns
Augment.Description: 2nd Degree Burns: On Hit: 10% chance to slow 50% (No Save) for 10 sec (non-bosses only).

Augment.Name: Wrath of Flames
Augment.Description: Wrath of Flames: On Hit: 5% Chance AOE 228 to 380 fire damage (DC 50 Reflex Save for half).

Augment.Name: Paralyzing Fear
Augment.Description: Paralyzing Fear: On Hit: 5% chance to Paralyze for 5 sec. (No save)

Augment.Name: Wrath of Shadows
Augment.Description: Wrath of Shadows: On Hit: 5% Chance AOE 228 to 380 negative energy damage (DC 50 Fortitude Save for half).

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Focus
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Focus: Passive: +3 Equipment Bonus to all Spell DCs.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Abjuration Focus
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Abjuration Focus:2 Passive: +6 Equipment Bonus to the DC to resist your Abjuration spells.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Conjuration Focus
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Conjuration Focus:2 Passive: +6 Equipment Bonus to the DC to resist your Conjuration spells.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Enchantment Focus
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Enchantment Focus:2 Passive: +6 Equipment Bonus to the DC to resist your Enchantment spells.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Evocation Focus
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Evocation Focus:2 Passive: +6 Equipment Bonus to the DC to resist your Evocation spells.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Illusion Focus
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Illusion Focus:2 Passive: +6 Equipment Bonus to the DC to resist your Illusion spells.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Necromancy Focus
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Necromancy Focus:2 Passive: +6 Equipment Bonus to the DC to resist your Necromancy spells.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Transmutation Focus
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Transmutation Focus:2 Passive: +6 Equipment Bonus to the DC to resist your Transmutation spells.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Spell Penetration
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Spell Penetration: Passive: +7 Bonus to Spell Penetration.

Augment.Name: Green Augment Slot
Augment.Description: Adds a Green Augment Slot to this item

Augment.Name: Purple Augment Slot
Augment.Description: Adds a Purple Augment Slot to this item

Augment.Name: Acid Storm
Augment.Description: Acid Storm: Black Dragon Breath (3 uses per rest): Like a black dragon, you can breathe a powerful stream of acid that deals 1d15 + 15 acid damage per caster level (Reflex save for half) to enemies within its area of effect. You can use this ability 5 times per rest. (Text says 5 times, charge bar says 3 / 3 Charges) caster level: 30

Augment.Name: Ice Storm
Augment.Description: Ice Storm: White Dragon Breath (3 uses per rest): Like a white dragon, you can breathe a powerful cone of intense cold that deals 1d15 + 15 cold damage per caster level (Reflex save for half) to enemies within its area of effect. You can use this ability 5 times per rest. (Text says 5 times, charge bar says 3 / 3 Charges) caster level: 30

Augment.Name: Fire Storm
Augment.Description: Fire Storm: Red Dragon Breath (3 uses per rest): Like a red dragon, you can breathe a powerful cone of intense flames that deals 1d15 + 15 fire damage per caster level (Reflex save for half) to enemies within its area of effect. You can use this ability 5 times per rest. (Text says 5 times, charge bar says 3 / 3 Charges) caster level: 30

Augment.Name: Lightning Storm
Augment.Description: Lightning Storm: Blue Dragon Breath (3 uses per rest): Like a blue dragon, you can breathe a powerful bolt of lightning that deals 1d15 + 15 electric damage per caster level (Reflex save for half) to enemies within its area of effect. You can use this ability 5 times per rest. (Text says 5 times, charge bar says 3 / 3 Charges) caster level: 30

Augment.Name: 3rd Degree Burns
Augment.Description: 3rd Degree Burns: On Vorpal: 85 to 195 Fire Damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds, and adds 1-5 stacks of Vulnerability.

Augment.Name: Crippling Flames
Augment.Description: Crippling Flames: On Crit: 135 to 325 Fire Damage. On Hit: 5% chance to apply 2 Negative Levels.

Augment.Name: Leg Breaker
Augment.Description: Leg Breaker: On Hit: 5% Chance Reflex Save -5, Trip Attempt.

Augment.Name: Mind Breaker
Augment.Description: Mind Breaker: On Hit: 5% Chance Will Save -5, Hold Monster Attempt.

Augment.Name: Eternal Chilling Darkness
Augment.Description: Eternal Chilling Darkness: On Negative / Cold Spell Damage: +50 temp SP 30 seconds (triggers once per 45 seconds).

Augment.Name: Mortal Fear
Augment.Description: Mortal Fear: On Hit: 8 to 64 Force Damage. In addition, 5% chance to cut non-boss foe's current health in half.

Augment.Name: Body Breaker
Augment.Description: Body Breaker: On Hit: 5% Chance Fortitude Save -5, Sunder Attempt.

Augment.Name: Eternal Scorching Light
Augment.Description: Eternal Scorching Light: On Light / Fire Spell Damage: +50 temp SP 30 seconds (triggers once per 45 seconds).

Augment.Name: Burning Emptiness
Augment.Description: Burning Emptiness: On Vorpal: 55 to 110 Fire Damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. On Crit: 108 to 260 Negative Energy Damage.

Augment.Name: Draconic Reinvigoration
Augment.Description: Draconic Reinvigoration: Passive: +1 use/rest to Action Boost, Rallying Cry, Smite Evil, Turn Undead and Bard Songs. On Damage or Spell Damage: 2% chance to generate 1 Action Boost, Rallying Cry, Smite Evil, Turn Undead, and Bard Songs (triggers once per 100 seconds).

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Lore
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Lore: Passive: All your spells gain a +17% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Acid Lore
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Acid Lore: Passive: Your Acid spells gain a +22% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Healing Lore
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Healing Lore: Passive: Your Healing spells gain a +22% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Void Lore
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Void Lore: Passive: Your Negative/Poison Energy spells gain a +22% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Ice Lore
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Ice Lore: Passive: Your Cold spells gain a +22% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Kinetic Lore
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Kinetic Lore: Passive: Your Force spells gain a +22% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Fire Lore
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Fire Lore: Passive: Your Fire spells gain a +22% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Radiance Lore
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Radiance Lore: Passive: Your Light and Alignment spells gain a +22% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Sonic Lore
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Sonic Lore: Passive: Your Sonic spells gain a +22% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Lightning Lore
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Lightning Lore: Passive: Your Electric spells gain a +22% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Dwarvencraft Repair Lore
Augment.Description: Dwarvencraft Repair Lore: Passive: Your Repair spells gain a +22% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
